CustomField.description: US-0009462 - UK Risk: new permission, record type and page layout on Project
CustomField.formula: TEXT(FLOOR(EBH_Seller__r.EBH_Tenure__c/365.25) )& " Years " & TEXT(IF( EBH_Seller__r.EBH_Tenure__c / 365.25 * 12 < 1, 0, FLOOR(EBH_Seller__r.EBH_Tenure__c / 365.25 * 12) - (Year__c * 12))) & " Months " & TEXT(Round(MOD(EBH_Seller__r.EBH_Tenure__c/30.4375,1)*30.4375,0) ) & " Days"
CustomField.label: Time on file (TOF)
